wikipedia_page.main: Charles Edward Hungerford Atholl Colston, 1st Baron Roundway   (16 May 1854 – 17 June 1925) was a British Conservative Party politician. He sat in the House of Commons from 1892 to 1906, and was later elevated to the peerage, taking his seat in the House of Lords.

response: *Charles Colston, 1st Baron Roundway (1854–1925), British Conservative Party politician
